pci_databases_users_modify_password_moda: Are you sure you want to reset this user password ?
pci_databases_users_modify_password_help: Must contain at least one number, one upper-case letter, and one lower-case letter. Must contain 8 characters or more.
pci_databases_users_modify_password_succ: The {{user}} user password has been successfully reseted to: {{password}}. Please note the password as it can't be retrieved once it's been reseted.
pci_databases_users_modify_password_erro: An error has occurred changing the password for the user {{user}}: {{message}}.
